resources.string: I agree on terms and condition

Welcome to the first version of our application.

It is in a test mode, so we kindly ask you to forgive us for possible errors.

Please help us to improve this application by sending your feedback and any questions related to its use to support@intime.digital
I want to help make this product better

This application is your personal digital bio-bank and health tracker with records storage history.

	Add the data to the required fields and connect your fitness application or wearables to synchronize.

	Today you need to enroll your data manually, but tomorrow we will sync it.

	Please keep your data updated.

Application is designed to monitor in real-time the key parameters of your body to provide information on how they can affect longevity and the possibility of developing serious diseases in the future.

	Our AI server will calculate your personal risks based on collected data.

	For better performance, we strongly recommend measuring yourself constantly even if there weren't significant events which influenced on your parameters changes.

Please rate us on Google Play page and leave your comments. It will help others to find our app and get health value out of it.

	Also, we want you to answer a few questions about our product.

	If you can help us, we will send it to your e-mail.

The most important thing is that the longer you measure and store your data, the more accurate the calculation of risks and forecasts will be.

	We will increase the number of parameters in the future.

	Track Early. Live Longer.
Our service is not a medical service.

Our services are second / third opinions
based on artificial intelligence algorithms
and statistics. We provide diagnostics only
of the likelihood of developing diseases
based on data on the health status of
people with similar parameters.

Our service is not a substitute for
professional medical care. If you have or
suspect that you may have health
problems, please consult your doctor.

Consult a specialist for advice. The
information provided in this application is
for informational purposes only and should
not be used for diagnosis or treatment.
To complete the registration you need follow the link sent to you by email.
If you have forgotten your password, please enter your e-mail address and we will send you a verification code, then you can reset your password.
To complete the reset your password you need follow the link sent to you by email
Enter new password, at least 8 characters, including 1 number and 1 special symbol
Trial version is expired. Please update your subscription.
For accurate operation of the application, please fill in basic information about yourself.
Please fill in the following fields:\n
For the application to work correctly, please enter your medical data.
By deleting your profile, you irrevocably lose all data on our website and in the mobile application. The operation is irreversible and you will no longer be able to log into your account.
Physical labor or training 3–5 times a week
Heavy physical labor or training 6–7 times a week
I unload the wagons day and night
once per two week or when weight changes
once per two week or when weight changes
one or three times a day
one or three times a day
one or three times a day
Average level of physical activity throughout the day
Systolic blood pressure – indicates how much pressure your blood is exerting against your artery walls when the heart beats
Diastolic blood pressure – indicates how much pressure your blood is exerting against your artery walls while the heart is resting between beats.
Something went wrong, please try again

Dear Customer! Welcome to the first version of the BMI Disease Tracker application. It is in a test mode, so we kindly ask you to forgive us for possible errors. Please help us to improve this application by sending your feedback and any questions related to its use to support@intime.digital. At the moment, the application has a technical design that will be improved soon. The BMI Disease Tracker app is designed to monitor in real-time the key parameters of your body to provide information on how they can affect longevity and the possibility of developing serious diseases in the future. Please enter the required data manually in the required fields and/or connect to your fitness application to synchronize data. If not all fields are provided, please add data manually. You can check your blood sugar and cholesterol data in your most recent medical tests if you do not remember your most recent results. Our AI server will calculate your personal risks based on the data collected and provide risk recommendations to reduce the likelihood of possible your wellbeing development. The more accurately you enter your data, the more accurate the results and recommendations will be. The frequency of risk and recommendation updates depends on how often the data in your fitness app is updated or you manually update it. In future releases, we plan to reduce the amount of manually entered data by expanding the number of supported fitness apps and individual devices to update risks and recommendations in real-time without any additional inconvenience. You are given a free period of 2 weeks for initial acquaintance with the application. Then you will be offered a monthly subscription, at a price less than a cup of coffee, for 1,99$ per month. The subscription price will grow for new customers, but for our first users who agreed to keep the application and use it even with minimal functionality, special conditions will remain for years. The most important thing is that the longer you measure your data, store, update it in the application by hand or through Google Fit / Health Kit or your smart wearable devices, the more accurate the calculation of risks and forecasts will be. We will be able to improve the accuracy and bring it up to 95%. Please note that this app is for informational and educational purposes only. It provides a "second opinion" and in the future, it will be possible to share the test results with your physician or find one through our partners. This is not a medical application and all decisions related to this application are entirely up to you. We will notify you of new updates, each of which is intended to provide you with more information about your health and how you can avoid the likelihood of developing certain diseases in the future. For more information, please visit: www.inTime.digital

Our service is not a medical service. Consult a specialist for advice. The information provided in this application is for informational purposes only and should not be used for diagnosis or treatment. Our service is not a substitute for professional medical care. If you have or suspect that you may have health problems, please consult your doctor. Our services are second/third opinion based on artificial intelligence algorithms and statistics. We provide diagnostics only of the likelihood of developing diseases based on data on the health status of people with similar parameters.
The probability of dying in the next 10 years from cardiovascular diseases.
Your cancer risks are same like other\npeople with normal weight.
Consult a specialist. It is not a\nmedical application.
Walk more than 8k steps per day
Walk more than 8000 steps per day is very important, it can improve health level and low weight and diseases risks.
